entry.title: The Convertible Mini Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description

Introducing the mini to our original Weekender, but better, because this lady has a bottom compartment that zips off completely! Same amount of function packed into a smaller silhouette! A bottom compartment that completely zips off so that this bag can go from Carry-On to Cocktails with just little zip zip zip!
Specifications

Dims: 16"W x 16"H x 8"D
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester
Trim - PU
Strap - Polyester
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 3.4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
External zip pocket for small items

INTERIOR
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
 
PERFECT FOR
Day Trips
Easy Overnights
Work Days
Gym Stuff
Mom Life
Carry-On

entry.title: The Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 98.00

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Hello, carry-on.

 
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable canvas (beige) OR polyester (black) material featuring easy to wipe clean faux patent trim
12" drop partially rolled handle for easy carry
wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Travel
Luggage Storage
Protecting your luggage

entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Messenger Tote in Tapestry
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 68.00

Description

A bag that goes both ways? How about SIX ways? A tote, a messenger, a 2-way backpack, a removable clutch - that can also be a sleek crossbody all in one super classic and sophisticated fabrication. We designed this bag to be as versatile as you but with a little wink to the tactility and electric fashions of past decades.
Shay's Inspo
“Okay, so I love this bag because you can wear it 100 different ways. Jut kidding. BUT, you can wear it a lot of different ways, the removable clutch makes this another bag that is perfect for going from day to night and the carry options makes it perfect for any mood or scenario. Overall she’s just your every day super fun, chic and functional bag. —Shay"
Details

REMOVABLE FLAP POUCH
Doubles as a clutch or crossbody
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE STRAP
Multiple ways to carry, 6 to be exact
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags

entry.title: The Weekender in Matcha Green Woven

Vendor: Beach House Group

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Hello, carry-on.

NEW! Adjustable Shoulder Strap
Multiple ways to carry.
NEW! STRAP WITH CLIP
Because: keys.
WATER-RESISTANT LINING
Keeps what’s inside nice and dry.
ZIP-NOOK FOR SHOES
No more sole-searching.
EXTERNAL POCKET
Keep small items at-hand. 
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 16” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
CARRY-ON COMPLIANT
Bring on the overhead bin.
DIMENSIONS
20.5 x 11 x 27.5

entry.title: The Convertible Weekender in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the convertible weekender
Price: 118.00

Description

Taking inspiration from our OG weekender, we designed this brand new convertible weekender to take you even further! Features a fully removable bottom compartment that doubles as a packing cube, with a mesh zip-cover. Voila! Now your weekender becomes a compact daytime excursion bag. Wait, not done yet - also includes a removable padded laptop sleeve with exterior pockets, to save you from that awkward moment when you hold up the security line. Easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Hello, versatility!
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs  
Details

EXTERIOR
-Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
-Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
-Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
-Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
-External zip pocket for small items
INTERIOR
-Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
-Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
-Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
-Long Weekends
-Carry-On Status
-Day Trips
-Baby Bag
-Work Bag
-Gym Bag
-Everyday Bag
-Pet Bag

entry.title: The Convertible Backpack in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 78.00

Description

Well aren't you just the most adorable and adaptable little thing we've ever seen?! Why yes, we do love that you can go from backpack to tote, to crossbody in a quick switch of a strap. Padded laptop sleeve, we see you! How about a secret pocket, mmm, hmmm! Yes we did pack it all in to this silohuette that is sure to be your next favorite campanion from everday to everywhere.
Shay's Inspo

“All our bags are designed for the “girl on the go,” but this one is particularly special because it is so versatile and caters to any type of gal with any type of style.  I designed this bag with all the different types of women in my life in mind, it is a seasonless black canvas with faux croc trim for the touch of flair.  It can also be worn multiple ways so no matter who you are or where you’re going you can pick up this bag and GO! ” — Shay
Details

CONVERTIBLE!
For a bag as versatile as you.
ADJUSTBALE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry.
RFID-LINED, FRONT EXTERIOR POCKET
Safety first.
TWO EXTERNAL POCKETS
Organize ALL the things.
KEY FOB 
Never lose them again! 
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE 
Fits up to 16” laptop.
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

entry.title: Travel Garment Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage
Price: 68.00

Description
The Travel Garment Bag from BÉIS pairs perfectly with a duffle bag and was designed for the stylists and fashionistas schlepping arm-fulls of clothing essentials from place to place. Forget carrying around bulky luggage full of clothes that doesn't fit in any overhead compartment. With its minimalistic and efficient sizing, you can transport all of your hanging garments with ease. This travel bag was made specifically for packing and unpacking delicates or formal wear while on the go, focusing on the things that would make your journey less hectic often unseen in a traditional garment bag.

Also working as the perfect weekend bag, it features a large zippered pocket on the exterior, providing enough room for smaller items and accessories along with a couple of pairs of shoes. The three felt hangers in the main compartment ensure your silky dresses won't fall to the bottom of the bag. We want you to be able to live that wrinkle-free life-with storage space for extras too!

 
Specifications

Dims: 45"H x 24"W
Material: Polyester, PVC, PU, Nylon Zipper,
Polyester velvet covered hangers
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2lbs
Details
EXTERIOR
- black, durable 210D nylon fabric with matte black hardware & faux leather trim
- 45" length when open, 22.5" when folded - 2" gusset
- double U-zip closure/opening
- butterfly opening for easy packing and unpacking
- exterior poly pocket for shoes +
- removable adjustable shoulder/crossbody strap
- handle straps with velcro wrap for attaching to luggage trolley handle
- clear window to see inside
- printed/embossed BÉIS logo
INTERIOR
- 3 flat velvet hangers, included
- clear luggage tag window
PERFECT FOR
-Travel
-Stylists' Rejoice!!!
-Long Dresses/Gowns
-Weddings!!!
-Bridesmaids
-Suits!
-Storing fancy things for protection
-Special Occasions

entry.title: The Duffle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Duffel Bags
Price: 78.00

Description
If there's one thing we know for certain about a weekend getaway, it's that life is so much easier when you can pack and carry all of your valuables and belongings neatly in one central travel duffle bag. The Black Duffle Bag from BÉIS is the perfect bag for just that! With a weekender bag designed with an additional front pocket for more space, you'll be able to pack at least two or three more of your weekend trip outfits for you to choose from that you couldn't fit in the main compartment. The side compartment makes the duffle a perfect alternative to a mini gym bag, holding gym clothes, shoes,  or other personal toiletry items. And just to make life a bit easier, there's an added trolley sleeve to take the weight off your shoulder when on the move. 

Oh, and it’s got a trolley sleeve too so you can slip it over your suitcase handle and use it as a travel bag whenever you’re on the move.


 
Shay's Inspo
“You can literally throw one of these travel duffle bags over your shoulder and look so badass.” — Shay
Details

NEW! ADJUSTABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry.

NEW! KEY FOB
Never lose your keys again.

WATER-RESISTANT LINING
Keeps what's inside nice and dry.

U-SHAPE TOP ZIP
Easier to stuff your stuff.

SIDE SHOE COMPARTMENT
No more sole-searching.

EXTERNAL POCKETS
Keep the small things at hand.

TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

- double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
- trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
- external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
- embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
- padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
- large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
- lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
- key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
-Travel
-Luggage Storage
-Protecting your luggage
